comment: Just as in the Wyvill formation, Black brings his king into safety on the Queenside. The consequence is that the advance of White's f-pawn and g-pawn (necessary for getting the f-file open) would now merely result in a serious weakening of the White King position
reasoning: The comment identifies a potential weakness in White’s position due to the king’s advance, suggesting a flawed tactical assessment.
